org.transitime.ipc.jms

Class RestartableMessageProducer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.ipc.jms.RestartableMessageProducer

  • public class RestartableMessageProducer
extends java.lang.Object
    Sometimes when sending a message it will turn out that the session and/or the producer will have been closed. This class allows the session and producer to automatically be restarted if necessary. This means that writing messages will not fail when running on a laptop that is woken up after being asleep.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith
